full_summary:
# Title and Reference Information
#### English
COVID-19 Open Data Curation
#### French
**CONSERVATION DE DONNÉES OUVERTES SUR LA COVID-19**

Reference Number: PW-23-01021934
Amendment Number: 0
Solicitation Number: 1000244792

### Tender Status
The tender for this contract has expired. The tender closing date was January 31, 2023, at 2:00 PM.

### Contract Description
As the public health agency of Canada addresses the COVID-19 pandemic, a rapid and accurate identification of related data is critical. The Canadian government identifies the need for reliable COVID-19 data for effective emergency response planning. This data informs Canadians, policy leaders, and researchers in their fight against the pandemic. This contract aims to support the curation of web data related to COVID-19 and other data essential for a comprehensive data supply.

### Project Details
- G Semantic Identification Number (GSIN): B219A
- Description: Other engineering studies
- UNSPSC Number: Not funded

### Procurement Details
- Category: Service (SRV)
- Notice Type: Advance Contract Award Notice
- Procurement Method: Competitive bidding
- Trade Agreement: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Location of Work: The National Capital Region of Canada

### Contact Information
- Name: Mohamed Abdillahi, Mira
- Contact Email: mira.abdillahi2@hc-sc.gc.ca
- Contact Phone Number: 613-941-2107

### Additional Documents
You can download the following documents:

- Bilingual Statement of Capabilities
- Bilingual ACAN

### Evaluation Criteria
The contracting entity, Health Canada, will evaluate bidders based on their capabilities as stated in the BIllingual Statement of Capabilities.

Note to contractor (You): these docs are not up-to-date as I rendered them.  Though I maintained the integrity of the text provided, the details in the docs now appear outdated. Please ensure the above text accurately reflects the data contained in the provider-sourced document. It is up to you to update the text appropriately. Keep the same information. Inaccurate info has potentially damaging downstream effects. 
Also FYI the text says < 400 words.  
Do let me know if the end product satisfies your needs.\
